name: Hallow's eve
description:
Hi guys, this is the 1st game I publish on Itch.IO, Im learning how games are made... I would like to hear from you what do you think about this one!

The game is like a bullet hell game but easier, I like halloween so I tried to make it  look like it

Move with A, S, D and W keys and hold down left mouse button to shot and space for special power.

Credits: https://sites.google.com/view/hallowseve-credits
